s.text: Brown said Talk was printed on thin paper to have "a roll-it-up-and-put-it-in-your-pocket, European feeling."

The paper said that, according to Gates Sr., the foundation will announce a number of new funding programs during the next three months that will go a long way toward its ultimate aim of becoming the largest private charity on Earth.

It said, "Brown wants to give Talk the feel of the best 1950s magazines, such as McCalls and Look , as well as Paris Match . Those magazines have all been widely admired, but it is a long time since they were considered at the forefront of the market."
